OR I could give a synopisis every month as to changes so that everybody doe=
sn't have to join 2 if they don't want, cause I really don't want to restar=
t, and even if the NBW council votes it doesn't count on NBM, which I've re=
named to Neo Cybertron RPG. I am willing to seperate the RPGs, so that ther=
e are 2 seperate RPGs, I just thought the Gateway would be good. I really d=
on't want to restart my RPG.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: minime=
_316@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, October 02, 200=
0 12:14 PM
  Subject: Re: Attack...


  (I know that no one knows how the P=
red gouvernement works. But what 
  I'm saying is that Dachande made a link=
 between the two RPG's, and 
  when that happens what happens in one affect=
s the other. In the Neo 
  Beast Machines, the Pred gouvernment is ruled by=
 one King named 
  Archon. That has too affect the Neo Beast Wars. I person=
ally think 
  that Dachande should have made it a separte RPG, but that was=
 his 
  decision. Thye only thin we can do is have everyone vote against it=
 
  and make Dachande re-start his RPG has a seperate entity, or have 
  ev=
eryone follow what goes on in the NBM so that they can relate it in 
  the =
posts.)

  Starscream

  Starscream laughed.

  "Thank You Zardus. The new =
breed of Predacons will not forget your 
  generosity, and will pay you bac=
k once the Maximals and Megatron are 
  out of the way."

  He turned to th=
e Lavacons.

  "I am Starscream, former ruler of the Decepticons and member=
 of the 
  newest faction of Predacons, commanded under KitKat. Please hold=
 on 
  one minute while I contact my group and than we will go."

  He sent=
 a comm:

  "Phobia, it's Starscream. Zardus isn't letting us take the 
  O=
blitercons, but he's letting us use the Lavacons, a group that by 
  the lo=
oks of things is stronger than the Oblitercons. We are about to 
  leave no=
w, but we need your co-ordinates."
  ______________________________________=
________________________________
  Vulois

  Vulois noticed that the firing=
 had stopped. It was either they gave 
  up on firing or are entering the m=
ountain. It would be foolish to do 
  so, but better think the foolish thin=
g when dealing with fools.

  "One of you three, stay in the back and wipe =
away our tracks. When we 
  get to the main base their are 4 more warriors =
waiting. We'll get 
  them and than attack this enemy."

  He kept walking.=

  ______________________________________________________________________
 =
 Trainers

  Prebon frowned.

  "Too bad....I was hoping for you to tell me=
 everything you knew about 
  your past life. It might help us know the sec=
rets of our enemy 
  better." He saw Spears emerge from the CR Chamber.

  =
"Spears! Great! Looks like we can take everyone to battle after all. 
  I'd=
 like you to meet Slayer, our new Trainer. He is the protoform of 
  your f=
riend...." Than Prebon eralized something. He needed to stop 
  talking abo=
ut the past. Slayer did not have a chip, meaning that even 
  though he was=
 loyal now, the future could change. If Slayer got 
  curious, he might sne=
ak away to the Maximals. They would reveal his 
  old personality and when =
tell all Trainer secrets.

  "Never mind who he is. No one will ever talk o=
f the past again. 
  Understand? Good. Spears, I really have no mission rig=
ht now. Soon we 
  will go into battle. We will gang up on Ramulus and kill=
 him. Right 
  now though, Slayer, come with me. I want you try on a War Su=
it that 
  will help you fight."

  Prebon started walking down to the carg=
o area.
